sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:f59b6a8f4f823300c09fb8de9310c70a</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>CargarModificarSelectBoxPersistencyBCR</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   //pregunto por la instancia primero  
	
	//lamar instancia primaria
	
	var tipoSolicitud = g_form.getValue('tipo_de_solicitud');
	
	if(tipoSolicitud == 'Modificar  Perfiles de Persistencia'){
		console.log("++++++modificar+++++++++");
		//cargo los datos al box
		// setRead Only nombre serviceGrouyp
		var ga = new GlideAjax('MostrarPersistencegroup32Include');
		ga.addParam("sysparm_name", "listarPG");
		//ga.addParam('sysparm_JSON_data',valor_Modificar);
		ga.getXML(getResponse);
		
		
	}else{
		//limpio campos
			g_form.setValue('nombre_del_servidor_virtual', '');
		g_form.setValue('tipo_de_protoc_lo', '');
		g_form.setValue('ip_address', '');
		
		
		
		
	}
	
	//function 
	
	// aqui carga por campos 
	function getResponse(response) {
		
		var values = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer');

		var arrayValue = JSON.parse(values).lbgroup;
		
			for(var i = 0; i < arrayValue.length; i++ ){
			var dataBoxFill = arrayValue[i].name;
			g_form.addOption('grupo_de_persistencsia_a_modificar',dataBoxFill,dataBoxFill);

			
		}//fin for
		

	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-07-19 22:26:27</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>93ddd13c4f32b300c09fb8de9310c7f2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CargarModificarSelectBoxPersistencyBCR</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="BCR_APP" source="x_287988_bcr_app">28f3b438db33230087d9d6aa48961993</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="BCR_APP">28f3b438db33230087d9d6aa48961993</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_93ddd13c4f32b300c09fb8de9310c7f2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>701980296</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-02-10 15:28:20</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
